jogo muito divertido, eu realmente gosto de jogar dbd, um pouco mal otimizado... e alguns bugs, jogo muito repetitivo mas com amigos fica muito mais jogavel, dlc perfeitas com personagens licenciados, como: myers, freddy, pig (saw) e a perfeiÃ§Ã£o da dlc do silent hill <3 recomendo muito !

Great Game. Only Game that has most of my favorite iconic killers from childhood and it even has stranger things. its pretty good. There are negatives to the game but none that would keep me from the game. Worth the buy.
Fun but can be stressful playing as a killer. Would highly recommend
buenardooooo brotheeer no hay ningÃºn juego que se le parezca

Es buen juego, buena jugabilidad, buena ambientacion y mapas copados. Lo unico de lo que me quejo es del emparejamiento, muchas veces me paso que siendo rango 15 de superviviente me emparejaba con supervivientes y asesino de rango 1-4, y lo mismo me pasa cuando soy asesino. Otra cosa mala pero que no es culpa del juego es la comunidad, ni idea si soy yo que tengo mala suerte o que, pero en la mayoria de las partidas me encontre a tipos que se enojaban porque los mataste y de repente sos tunelero y camper, o manco.

Terrible Power Creep for Killers and currently the match making is more broken than the middle east. Brand new killers constantly get matched with rank 1-4 survivors and it ruins their sometimes first experience. I think its a plot to let high level killer and survivor streamers to get faster queues to promote the game instead of caring about their game. Its fun if you have 4 survivors or if you enjoy killer but they can't seem to figure out match making 4 years into the game. And there are always more glitches with every patch, many times ruining the experience for someone. Bad graphical integrity for hits or pallet slams etc. Its fun just don't take it too seriously, its a joke of a game. If you're unable to control your emotions like an adult like I fail to do, these glitches and power creep will drive you to drinking and ripping your hair out. Million dollar company btw.

Recomiendo este juego para toda aquella persona que es un asesino contenido por estas maldita cultura del buen hombre. Llego a casa de mi vida rutinaria y laboral para descargar mis deseos violentos reprimidos en este juego, me genera una exitaciÃ³n sexual matal supervivients, verlos sufrir y pedir inclemencia.

so noed?

jokes aside, I would love to recommend this game, its really fun and matches can be interesting, however... there are a lot of issues with balance of perks on both sides, survivor and killer, there are a lot of maps that are either killer sided or survivor sided (though I suppose you could call that adding challenges for each side during each match?), imbalanced killers (prepare to see a lot of one kind of killer), the problem of survive with friends groups coming in with specialized builds and shitting all over a killer, and finally the absolutely, positively, outrageously toxic community that either calls the killer a tunneling, slugging POS baby killer, etc etc. Or killers that call survivors talentless idiots who use perks as such hard crutches to do anything or giant babies for getting destroyed by Hex: Ruin or No One Escapes Death. A lot of blame throwing and toxicity, mingled together with a lot of balancing issues throws a lot of dirt over a game that is incredible, and I mean TRULY incredible. There's no thrill like escaping from a killer by the skin of your teeth, or managing to kill every. single. survivor. using nothing but your mindgaming skills as killer.

Basically, the game is fun, exciting, and rewarding to play, but is burdened with terrible balance in perks, killers, maps, SWF groups, etc etc.

With all things considered, especially the new issue of matchmaking throwing high rank 
players versus low rank ones, 

I CANNOT recommend this game as it is right now. 

Too many problems, combined with added difficulty from being unable to find real help from any forum or discussion of this game due to rampant toxicity makes things hard for a newer player. Only play this if the idea of having a few good matches thrown in with a lot of really frustrating and sweaty ones appeals to you. And don't think about using nonoptimal perks, unless you know what you are doing, you are in for a bad time.

[h1] DO NOT BUY THIS GAME [/h1]
Anti cheat system is a joke, support system is a joke. I got to play 3-4 matches until I got the "party creation failed" error. 
After that I proceeded to check the game files using steam (which found some missing files and downloaded them) but still no deal. After rebooting my machine, there's the perma ban notification. I opened support tickets and they claim I broke the game's EULA on several accounts and my access to the game has been revoked, which makes no sense, this is the only account I own, and I didn't even have enough time to try to break something or cheat even if I wanted to. Simply ridiculous.
[b] Do not buy this game unless you want to throw away your cash[\b]. You have been warned. You can look up similar cases, I'm not the only one.
it is fun but people are toxic so its like any other public event.
